decks.notes: The key strategy of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent quickly with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing a mix of efficient creatures like Optimistic Scavenger and Nurturing Pixie, along with disruptive cards like Duress and Go for the Throat, you can keep your opponent on the back foot while building up your own board presence. This deck aims to control the tempo of the game and pressure your opponent into making suboptimal plays, ultimately leading to victory through a mix of early aggression and well-timed disruption.
